entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Western Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 7:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
